name: notion
description: Notion integration for business planning documentation, operational playbooks, compliance tracking, and team knowledge management. Enables agents to create structured pages, databases, and linked views in a shared workspace.
use_cases: Executive summary and integrated business plan narrative
Go-to-market plan with channel strategy and marketing calendar
Sales playbook with ICP definition, objection handling, and outreach templates
Compliance checklist and calendar with status tracking and deadlines
Customer persona documents with behavioral data and buying process
Org chart descriptions with role definitions and 90-day mandates
Process maps for key business workflows (onboarding, support, hiring)
Content calendar with topics, channels, and publication schedule
Campaign briefs with objectives, targeting, and success metrics
Risk register with probability, impact, and mitigation tracking
Contract template requirements with priority ranking and key terms
IP strategy documentation with protection timeline and costs
Competitive landscape analysis with feature comparison matrix
Board meeting minutes and decision log
team_integration: Notion serves as the primary output destination for all narrative and structured documents produced by the C-Suite Team. During Phase 6 artifact generation, each specialist creates their domain-specific pages within a shared workspace organized by function. The CEO creates the top-level business plan structure and executive summary. All cross-references between documents use Notion page links for navigation. The workspace becomes the living operating manual for the business.

sections.executive_summary: CEO -- 1-page business overview and strategic priorities
sections.market_analysis: CMO -- TAM/SAM/SOM, competitive landscape, customer personas
sections.product_strategy: CTO -- MVP specification, roadmap overview, tech stack
sections.go_to_market: CMO + VP Sales -- channel strategy, positioning, sales process
sections.sales_playbook: VP Sales -- ICP, pipeline model, pricing, objection handling
sections.financial_overview: CFO -- key metrics summary with links to Google Sheets model
sections.operations: COO -- org chart, hiring plan, process maps, vendor assessment
sections.legal_compliance: General Counsel -- entity, compliance, contracts, IP, risk register
sections.pitch_materials: CEO -- pitch deck content, investor FAQ, key metrics
sections.appendices: All -- supporting research, data sources, methodology notes

write: Each agent writes to their designated section only
CEO writes to executive summary and cross-functional pages
